snippet: Five couples filed a lawsuit in federal court in Anchorage on Monday, challenging Alaska’s ban on same-sex marriage as unconstitutional.
abstract: Five gay couples file federal lawsuit in Anchorage, challenging Alaska's ban on same-sex marriage as unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: Five couples filed a lawsuit in federal court in Anchorage on Monday, challenging Alaska’s ban on same-sex marriage as unconstitutional.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
